info.name: YouTube bigger (HD) player for HD videos!
info.description:
This userstyle enlarges the standard wide player in the new YouTube design.
It is optimized for 720p videos but you can edit the height to 1080px if you want to.

New version for transparent player available:
https://userstyles.org/styles/115676/youtube-bigger-hd-player-for-transparent-player
